channel.title: Phone Computers Nokia on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Phone Computers Nokia on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: the stones are falling from the ceiling and making a fortress
item.description: i know I haven’t updated in a while. do you think you can forgive me? I hope so. we all go through times where computers burn our fingers when we touch them. this wasn’t one of those times. I just didn’t feel like it. sometimes that happens. but whatever. I am back. for tonight. maybe for a couple days. maybe for a couple months. maybe for just a minute. but whatever.
